#summary Showed using of tool as a quick overview.

= Simple steps of using =

 * Wrap all diagnostic instances by special object.
 * At all points, where we catch exception, we can capture diagnostic information. For example, log this data to file/console.
 * If exception happened, library system collect all info about and we can use it.
